mapper.insert: insert into kiki(kikiSysId, kikiBunrui, kikiBunruiSeq, kikiNo, kikiMei, syukan, makerRyaku, maker, katasikiNo, serialNo, orderNo, bikou, imageId, trkDate, updDate) values( #{kikiSysId}, #{kikiBunrui}, #{kikiBunruiSeq}, #{kikiNo}, #{kikiMei}, #{syukan}, #{makerRyaku}, #{maker}, #{katasikiNo}, #{serialNo}, #{orderNo}, #{bikou}, #{imageId}, #{trkDate}, #{updDate} )

insert into kiki(kikiSysId, kikiBunrui, kikiBunruiSeq, kikiNo, kikiMei, syukan, makerRyaku, maker, katasikiNo, serialNo, orderNo, bikou, imageId, trkDate, updDate) values( #{kikiSysId}, #{kikiBunrui}, #{kikiBunruiSeq}, #{kikiNo}, #{kikiMei}, #{syukan}, #{makerRyaku}, #{maker}, #{katasikiNo}, #{serialNo}, #{orderNo}, #{bikou}, #{imageId}, #{trkDate}, #{updDate} )
mapper.update: update kiki set kikiBunrui=#{kikiBunrui}, kikiBunruiSeq=#{kikiBunruiSeq}, kikiNo=#{kikiNo}, kikiMei=#{kikiMei}, syukan=#{syukan}, makerRyaku=#{makerRyaku}, maker=#{maker}, katasikiNo=#{katasikiNo}, serialNo=#{serialNo}, orderNo=#{orderNo}, bikou=#{bikou}, imageId=#{imageId} where kikiId=#{kikiId}
mapper.select: select kikiId from kiki ORDER BY kikiId DESC limit 1
